name: getOrganizationClientsOverview
description: Return summary information around client data usage (in mb) across the given organization.

t0.description: The beginning of the timespan for the data.

t1.description: The end of the timespan for the data. t1 can be a maximum of 31 days after t0.

timespan.description: The timespan for which the information will be fetched. If specifying timespan, do not specify parameters t0 and t1. The value must be in seconds and be less than or equal to 31 days. The default is 1 day.

$ul: **total**: Total number of clients with data usage in organization
**usage**: Usage information of all clients across organization
**average**: Average data usage (in kb) of each client in organization
**overall**: Overall data usage of all clients across organization
**downstream**: Downstream data usage (in kb) of all clients across organization
**total**: Total data usage (in kb) of all clients across organization
**upstream**: Upstream data usage (in kb) of all clients across organization
